member.name: M:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.IsNameStructured(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@)
member.summary: Determines whether the current path is part of the Path Structure format.
member.param: Sets the default search location within the Path Structure.
A reference to a list that will be filled with the XPath to any valid Path Structure nodes.

member.name: M:Path_Structure_Maintenance.PathStructure.IsLocationValid(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Determines if the current path is valid according to the provided Path Structure node.
member.param: The Path Structure node to check against the current path.
